item.title: Making it so my staff can't teleport to the owners
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

if (command.startsWith("xteletome") && playerRights >= 2) { try { String pName = command.substring(10); int pIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(pName); if(pName.playerRights == 3) { String s = "You cannot teleport to the owner."; sendMessage(s); } else if (pIndex != -1 && pName.playerRights != 3) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[pIndex]; p.toX = absX; p.toY = absY; p.heightLevel = heightLevel; p.updateRequired = true; p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; p.sendMessage("You have been teleported to " + playerName); } else { sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); } } catch (Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to tele to you.."); } }

Read full topic
item.source: Making it so my staff can't teleport to the owners

item.title: Making it so my staff can't teleport to the owners
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

[quote=“Owner Nader, post:19, topic:282196”]lol, if you confused about the text/code or something then just try it? its best way to finde out how it is,

[color=red]~Nader[/quote]

Can you please leave my topic man?

[quote=“x blitz x, post:18, topic:282196”][code]
else if (command.startsWith(“xteleto”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

            if(!playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Bill") || !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Dillon")) {
                if(otherPName.equalsIgnoreCase("Bill") || otherPName.equalsIgnoreCase("Dillon")) {
                    otherPIndex = -1;
                }
            }

            if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                teleportToX = p.absX;
                teleportToY = p.absY;
                heightLevel = p.heightLevel;
                updateRequired = true;
                sendMessage("You teleport to " + p.playerName + ".");
            } 
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Player is either offline, or an owner!");
        }

    }

[/code][/quote]

I’ll try it out. It makes sense.

Read full topic

item.title: Making it so my staff can't teleport to the owners
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

else if (command.startsWith("xteleto") && (playerRights >= 2)) {
            try {
                String otherPName = command.substring(8);
                int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if(!playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Bill") || !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Dillon")) {
                    if(otherPName.equalsIgnoreCase("Bill") || otherPName.equalsIgnoreCase("Dillon")) {
                        otherPIndex = -1;
                    }
                }

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                    teleportToX = p.absX;
                    teleportToY = p.absY;
                    heightLevel = p.heightLevel;
                    updateRequired = true;
                    sendMessage("You teleport to " + p.playerName + ".");
                } 
            } catch (Exception e) {
                sendMessage("Player is either offline, or an owner!");
            }

        }

item.title: Making it so my staff can't teleport to the owners
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

JoshB™:

Rune, you don’t understand the code… learn what ! means.

Yes… I do… ! basically means doesn’t. if(youreGay()) means if you’re gay. if(!youreGay()) means if you’re not gay.

[quote=“Owner Nader, post:16, topic:282196”]Lol im confused,
The easy way to stop it its to tell them to dont tele to you and your co lol,
thats what i do on my server,
=O[/quote]

No dude…

And actually I didn’t see this one: [code]else if (command.startsWith(“xteleto”) && (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Bill”)))
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

            if (otherPIndex != -1 && !otherPName.equalsIgnoreCase("Dillon") && !otherPName.equalsIgnoreCase("Bill")) {
                client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                teleportToX = p.absX;
                teleportToY = p.absY;
                heightLevel = p.heightLevel;
                updateRequired = true;
                sendMessage("You teleport to " + p.playerName + ".");
            } 
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Player is either offline, or an owner!");
        }

    }[/code] and I'm really retarded for not seeing that and how it works.

EDIT: No that’s still not what I wanted.

[quote=“booster, post:13, topic:282196”][code]else if (command.startsWith(“xteleto”) && (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Bill”)))
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

            if (otherPIndex != -1 && !otherPName.equalsIgnoreCase("Dillon) && !otherPName.equalsIgnoreCase("Bill")) {
                client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                teleportToX = p.absX;
                teleportToY = p.absY;
                heightLevel = p.heightLevel;
                updateRequired = true;
                sendMessage("You teleport to " + p.playerName + ".");
            } 
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Player is either offline, or an owner!");

    }[/code]

[code]else if (command.startsWith(“xteleto”) && (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Bill”)))

        try {
            String otherPName = command.substring(8);
            int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

            if (otherPIndex != -1) {

item.title: Making it so my staff can't teleport to the owners
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:5, topic:282196”]So why not just make two commands:

Here is the normal staff teleport:

[code]else if (command.startsWith(“xteleto”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

            if (otherPIndex != -1 && !otherPName.equalsIgnoreCase("Dillon) && !otherPName.equalsIgnoreCase("Bill")) {
                client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                teleportToX = p.absX;
                teleportToY = p.absY;
                heightLevel = p.heightLevel;
                updateRequired = true;
                sendMessage("You teleport to " + p.playerName + ".");
            } 
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Player is either offline, or an owner!");
        }

    }[/code]

And a second command that only you and the other owner can use.

[code]else if (command.startsWith(“oteleto”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Dillon”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Bill”)) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

            if (otherPIndex != -1 ) {
                client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                teleportToX = p.absX;
                teleportToY = p.absY;
                heightLevel = p.heightLevel;
                updateRequired = true;
                sendMessage("You teleport to " + p.playerName + ".");
            } 
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Player is offline");
        }

    }[/code][/quote]

Is that really needed though? It just seems like a waste of space to me =\ I mean, my idea seems easy but it’s not working for some reason…

[quote=“Owner Nader, post:4, topic:282196”]Umm i got a suggestion ,

You saying your staff cant tele to ( You & You co Owner ) Then just make the xteleto command do owners only, =\

This is my suggestion,[/quote]

That’s not what I want.

Read full topic
item.source: Making it so my staff can't teleport to the owners

item.title: Making it so my staff can't teleport to the owners
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

So why not just make two commands:

Here is the normal staff teleport:

[code]else if (command.startsWith(“xteleto”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

            if (otherPIndex != -1 && !otherPName.equalsIgnoreCase("Dillon) && !otherPName.equalsIgnoreCase("Bill")) {
                client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                teleportToX = p.absX;
                teleportToY = p.absY;
                heightLevel = p.heightLevel;
                updateRequired = true;
                sendMessage("You teleport to " + p.playerName + ".");
            } 
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Player is either offline, or an owner!");
        }

    }[/code]

And a second command that only you and the other owner can use.

[code]else if (command.startsWith(“oteleto”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Dillon”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Bill”)) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

            if (otherPIndex != -1 ) {
                client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                teleportToX = p.absX;
                teleportToY = p.absY;
                heightLevel = p.heightLevel;
                updateRequired = true;
                sendMessage("You teleport to " + p.playerName + ".");
            } 
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Player is offline");
        }

    }[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Making it so my staff can't teleport to the owners
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Here it is without my coding applied to it: [code]else if (command.startsWith(“xteleto”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

            if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                teleportToX = p.absX;
                teleportToY = p.absY;
                heightLevel = p.heightLevel;
                updateRequired = true;
                sendMessage("You teleport to " + p.playerName + ".");
            } 
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Player is offline. If they're not, try logging out and in.");
        }

    }[/code]

Here is where I was adding it:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“xteleto”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

    if (otherPName.equalsIgnoreCase("Bill") || otherPName.equalsIgnoreCase("Dillon") && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Bill") || !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Dillon")) {
	sendMessage("You may not teleport to the owner.");
	return;
	}

            if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                teleportToX = p.absX;
                teleportToY = p.absY;
                heightLevel = p.heightLevel;
                updateRequired = true;
                sendMessage("You teleport to " + p.playerName + ".");
            } 
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Player is offline. If they're not, try logging out and in.");
        }

    }[/code]

Read full topic
